title: Individualized Feedback Course for Improving Pharmaceutical Practical Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic pharmaceutical terminology and foundational knowledge of patient counseling
context.additional_context: Non-degree corporate education program for working professionals, emphasizing smartphone-based learning activities

learning_goals: Learners apply communication skills with 80% accuracy in standard simulated patient consultation scenarios.
Learners achieve a performance level of at least 75% based on clinical competency evaluation criteria.
Learners establish self-improvement plans with a 90% participation rate based on individualized feedback reports.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
